Ability.Name: Shinai Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Strike down on a target enemy.

Ability.Name: Kendo Strike
Ability.Description: Charges with shinai in a direction, mowing down any enemies or small obstacles in the way.

Ability.Name: Motivate
Ability.Description: Increases Charles' and Nate's Speed.

Ability.Name: Ninjutsu
Ability.Description: Teleports Charles and Nate to a point. Afterwards, shoots kunais outward that temporarily stuns nearby enemies.

Ability.Name: Claw Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Swipe at a target with claws.

Ability.Name: Hulk Rage
Ability.Description: Strengthens Nate with extra Attack and Health restoration over time.

Ability.Name: Stare Down
Ability.Description: Deals damage and stuns an enemy through the power of fear.

Ability.Name: Enrage
Ability.Description: Allows Nate to deal extra damage on his next three moves.

Ability.Name: Railgun Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Shoots a bullet toward a target.

Ability.Name: Eyelash Batting
Ability.Description: Stuns an enemy for a few seconds.

Ability.Name: Shoe Throwing
Ability.Description: Throws a random shoe toward a target out of anger.

Ability.Name: Death Shout
Ability.Description: Stuns all enemies within the shout's range for a second. #loudwhitegirl

Ability.Name: A. Mediation
Ability.Description: [Aggressive Mediation] Jump up and down violently. Probably does nothing at all. HA TAKE THAT KATA

Ability.Name: Magic Wand Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Shoot beams of magic to targets.

Ability.Name: Bling Bling
Ability.Description: Creates a temporary aura of circles that heals Cia and deals damage to closeby enemies.

Ability.Name: Taking Heart
Ability.Description: Seals an enemy in a magical circlet, which slows the enemy and siphons Health after a few seconds.

Ability.Name: Logic Puzzle
Ability.Description: Nearby enemies surrounding Cia are slowed for a few seconds.

Ability.Name: Cheer
Ability.Description: C. Kata restores some HP every few seconds.

Ability.Name: Tentacle Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Slash at nearby enemies with tentacles.

Ability.Name: Perk-kulate
Ability.Description: Charges in and deals damage to surrounding enemies from provocative dance moves.

Ability.Name: V.P.S.
Ability.Description: [Violation of Personal Space] Charges in and deals damage to surrounding enemies, slowing them at an uncomfortable distance.

Ability.Name: Awkward Stare
Ability.Description: Charges in and stuns himself and nearby enemies.

Ability.Name: Hoverpad Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Shoots two guided lasers toward a target.

Ability.Name: Arrow Control
Ability.Description: Shoots arrows in a direction. Hold down to shoot more arrows.

Ability.Name: D4X
Ability.Description: Dashes in a straight line, stunning any enemies in the way.

Ability.Name: Mediation
Ability.Description: Creates a magic and apologetic wall that lasts for four seconds.

Ability.Name: Apologizing
Ability.Description: Restores a small amount of HP per second. But really, he stopped doing this a few months ago. REALLY. OMG SHUT UP, YOU HATER.

Ability.Name: Megaphone Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Creates a sound shockwave.

Ability.Name: Tickle Fight
Ability.Description: Deals damage to surrounding enemies. Enemies give up extra friendship points.

Ability.Name: Awkward Turtle
Ability.Description: Deals damage and slows an enemy.

Ability.Name: Ramen!
Ability.Description: Restores Health to any Unit.

Ability.Name: Strength Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Charge toward an enemy and overpower it.

Ability.Name: Lung Crusher
Ability.Description: Crushes the enemy through the power of hugging at close-range.

Ability.Name: Deep Sleep
Ability.Description: Restores Health over time. Tevin cannot move nor use abilities during this time.

Ability.Name: Sonic Laugh
Ability.Description: Launches a conical sound blast in front of him, damaging and slowing down enemies.

Ability.Name: Staff Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Whack nearby enemies with a medical staff.

Ability.Name: Happy Healing
Ability.Description: Restores some HP to a target Unit.

Ability.Name: Shield
Ability.Description: Creates an invulnerable barrier around Chloe that lasts for five seconds.

Ability.Name: Healthy Explosion
Ability.Description: Damages close target

Ability.Name: Orgo Book Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Whack nearby enemies with an Orgo textbook.

Ability.Name: Final Destination
Ability.Description: Change X's and Ananya's Friendship Finale to Destination Zero.

Ability.Name: Sunshine
Ability.Description: Gains one solar charge every few seconds. After gaining three charges and activating again, sends forth bursts of solar energy.

Ability.Name: Happiness
Ability.Description: Creates a ray of solar energy.

Ability.Name: M. Gun Attack
Ability.Description: Basic Attack: Shoot down an enemy with rapid gunfire.

Ability.Name: Shockwave
Ability.Description: Creates an energy wave that damages enemies in its path.

Ability.Name: Bio-Leech
Ability.Description: Siphons Health from target enemy.

Ability.Name: Overload
Ability.Description: Powers up Raymon on first time activation. Unleashes a destructive attack to nearby enemies on second activation, powering down Raymon.

Ability.Name: Break Time
Ability.Description: Freezes all enemies and their attacks for three seconds.

Ability.Name: Greedy
Ability.Description: Increases the Flexpoint drop rate of defeated enemies.

Ability.Name: Popularity
Ability.Description: Increases the item drop rate of defeated enemies.

Ability.Name: Second Chance
Ability.Description: Revives this Unit to half HP after he/she reaches 0 HP. Can only be used once per stage.

Ability.Name: Second World
Ability.Description: Revives this Unit to full HP after he/she reaches 0 HP. Can only be used once per stage.

Ability.Name: Girly Swirl
Ability.Description: Launches a grrl-rific swirl attack at an enemy. Gangsters take 2800 damage.

Ability.Name: Gossip
Ability.Description: Launches a grrl-rific gossip attack at an enemy. Gangsters take 28000 damage.
